furdeb 0.9.0
  • Reference

Reference

Databases manipulations

Functions for databases manipulations, like connection or conversion.

access_dbconnection()

Connection with Access database

postgresql_db_connection()

Connection to a PostgreSQL database

mdb2Sqlite3()

Converting an Access database to an SQLite3 database

Spatial design

Functions for spatial design.

avdth_position_conversion_dec()

AVDTH database position conversion

create_cwp_grid()

Creates a CWP (FAO Coordinating Working Party) grid spatial object

lat_lon_cwp_manipulation()

Conversion function for latitude, longitude and cwp item

lat_long_to_csquare()

Latitude-longitude to c-square converter

marine_area_overlay()

Consistent spatial marine area overlay (related to fao area)

Referentials

Functions related to referentials.

fishing_mode_code_to_name()

Fishing mode(s) name(s) creation

gear_code_to_name()

Gear(s) name(s) creation

ocean_code_to_name()

Ocean(s) name(s) creation

Graphics tools

Functions for graphics use.

add_vertices()

Densify a spatial polygon by adding vertices

ggplot_corr()

Correlogram function

Setup help

Functions for setup and R session configuration.

mclapply_socket()

Define a sockets version of mclapply

configuration_file()

Configuration file
